trans-unit.resname: ANB·9 | Hallowed Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: ANB·46 | Compound Fracture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. It gets an additional -1/-1 until end of turn for each card named CARDNAME in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. It gets an additional -1/-1 until end of turn for each card named CARDNAME in your graveyard.

ANB·87 | Tin Street Cadet | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

trans-unit.resname: ANB·90 | Baloth Packhunter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
ANB·90 | Baloth Packhunter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
